channel.title: Creating a command
channel.description: How do you create a command?.... i used a voule command generator that came with the server i downloaded but i dont know where to put the command code in.

item.title: Creating a command
item.dc:creator: @unleashed_pvp unleashed pvp
item.description:
@unleashed_pvp wrote:

Okay for example you have ::pickup search for that, now il show you a command that i have added its very simple and easy just look.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godswords"))

{

addItem(2402, 1);
addItem(746, 1);
addItem(35, 1);
addItem(667,1);
sM(“You recieve all GodSwords!”); //SENDS THE MESSAGE!
}


As you see up the top of the command the is allways a space and a } so just look at your other commands and check them out and you’l eventualy get it like i did.

Good luck hope’d it help’s you.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a command
item.dc:creator: @stevenlin598 stevenlin598
item.description:
@stevenlin598 wrote:

if your using 562 then put it in commandpackethandler.java and commandspackethandler.java. If your using something that has client.java in its source folder them put it in the client.java.
You have to compile the server after you put the commands in

Read full topic
